title: Multigenerational value literacy education within families
description: Multigenerational value literacy education within families
content:
Scenario: Multigenerational value literacy education within families
    Given Sarah is teaching her children
    And she's learning from her parents' care wisdom
    And multiple generations participate in value education
    When family engages in value literacy learning
    Then the educational_elohim should coordinate across generations
    And grandparents' care knowledge should be honored
    And parents should teach children while still learning themselves
    And value literacy should be transmitted across generations
    And family should be primary educational site for care economy
